Literature.Title: Synthesis and Bioactivity Investigation of the Individual Components of Cyclic Lipopeptide Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Cui AL, Hu XX, Gao Y, Jin J, Yi H, Wang XK, Nie TY, Chen Y, He QY, Guo HF, Jiang JD, You XF, Li ZR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.12µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.12µg/ml)
